channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 4/1/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Knowledge Base Refinement: Users can now configure whether to refine knowledge base search results and customize instructions for the LLM in the Agent Information’s Advanced Settings page on how to optimize these results, enhancing AI agent performance when answering user queries. See tutorial. 3/20/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Webchat Widget Bubble Feature: Users can now add an attention-grabbing bubble near the webchat widget to make it more visually prominent and appealing.
